name: Hot Rod Hustle
blurb: Hot Rod Hustle is an MMO racing game that's inspired by games like Street Rod I & II and Motor City Online.

rewards.reward: No Reward

LEARNERS PERMIT ===========================\r\nGet a digital copy of Hot Rod Hustle on your system of choice + Hi Res Hot Rod Hustle Wallpaper Bundle + Digital copy of the official Hot Rod Hustle comic book + Kickstarter ONLY Hood Scoop waiting in the garage for you!

TUNE-UP \r\n===========================  \r\nGet a digital copy of Hot Rod Hustle + additional $500 of in game cash so you can hook up your ride + Hi Res Wallpaper Bundle + Kickstarter ONLY Hood Scoop and Rims + Digital copy of the official Hot Rod Hustle comic book

CAMS & HEADERS ===========================   \r\nGet a digital copy of Hot Rod Hustle + another $500 of in game cash ($1,000 total) + Hi Res Wallpaper Bundle + Kickstarter ONLY Hood Scoop, Rims, and Decal + Digital copy of the official HRH comic book

TEST DRIVE \r\n===========================  \r\nBe the very first to get a copy of the game on your chosen platform and help us to squash all those bugs + Have your opinions heard and contribute to making this game the best it can be - All previous rewards are included + Kickstarter ONLY Hood Scoop, Rims, Decal and a special 3 stage Paint job.

International Hot Rod =========================== Get a Digital copy of the game. Includes everything in the CAMS & HEADERS reward tier + Kickstarter ONLY Hood Scoop, Rims, Decal, Paint Job AND an exclusive RAT ROD only available to backers. Will be extremely rare and valuable in game.

THREADED (Early Bird) =========================== Get an exclusive Kickstarter only T-Shirt designed by Eli Hyder (ONLY THIS TIER) + Digital copy of the game. Includes everything in the CAMS & HEADERS reward tier + Kickstarter ONLY Hood Scoop, Rims, Decal, Paint Job AND an exclusive RAT ROD only available to backers. Will be extremely rare and valuable in game.

THREADED \r\n===========================  \r\nGet an exclusive Kickstarter only T-Shirt designed by Eli Hyder (ONLY THIS TIER) + Digital copy of the game. Includes everything in the CAMS & HEADERS reward tier + Kickstarter ONLY Hood Scoop, Rims, Decal, Paint Job AND an exclusive RAT ROD only available to backers. Will be extremely rare and valuable in game.

REBEL WITH A CAUSE (Early Bird) =========================== You'll receive an 18\u2033 \u00d7 24\u2033 full color poster with your choice of design signed by artist Eli Hyder. Includes everything in the CAMS & HEADERS reward tier. + Kickstarter ONLY Hood Scoop, Rims, Decal, Paint Job and RAT ROD

REBEL WITH A CAUSE ===========================  \r\nYou'll receive an 18\u2033 \u00d7 24\u2033 full color poster with your choice of design signed by artist Eli Hyder. Includes everything in the CAMS & HEADERS reward tier. + Kickstarter ONLY Hood Scoop, Rims, Decal, Paint Job and RAT ROD

GOOD OLE DAYS ===========================  \r\nGet the game in a Physical Box designed in Classic PC Game Style w/ printed Manual + Kickstarter exclusive ALTERNATE GARAGE. Includes everything in the CAMS & HEADERS reward tier + Kickstarter ONLY Hood Scoop, Rims, Decal, Paint Job and RAT ROD

CUSTOM SHOP\r\n===========================  \r\nGet a custom \u201cI\u2019d Rather be Hustling\u201d  Hot Rod Hustle license plate holder + Custom Playing Card Desk with the Game\u2019s Original Artwork + Kickstarter exclusive ALTERNATE GARAGE. Includes everything in the REBEL WITH A CAUSE reward tier.

CUSTOM ART\r\n===========================  \r\nGet a 20\u201d x 24\u201d framed canvas artwork signed by Eli Hyder + Get a custom \u201cI\u2019d Rather be Hustling\u201d  Hot Rod Hustle license plate holder + Custom Playing Card Deck with the Game\u2019s Original Artwork + Kickstarter exclusive ALTERNATE GARAGE. Includes everything CAMS & HEADERS in the reward tier + Kickstarter ONLY Hood Scoop, Rims, Decal, Paint Job and RAT ROD

JOIN THE GANG\r\n=========================== \r\nGet yourself drawn in the style of the game and we\u2019ll print it on a 20\u201d x 24\u201d and send it to you signed + get the video of your portrait becoming the character  + the image file for safe keeping. Includes everything CAMS & HEADERS in the reward tier + Kickstarter ONLY Hood Scoop, Rims, Decal, Paint Job and RAT ROD

VILLAGE VOICE\r\n=========================== \r\nGet the message of your choice on a billboard along the side of one of the game\u2019s road courses. Includes everything in the REBEL WITH A CAUSE reward tier + Kickstarter ONLY Hood Scoop, Rims, Decal, Paint Job and RAT ROD

CITY PLANNER\r\n========================== \r\nYou tell us a real life road you want in the game and it is done! We will accurately recreate that road and everyone will be able to race on it in the game - you can even help us name it! Includes everything in REBEL WITH A CAUSE reward tier + Kickstarter ONLY Hood Scoop, Rims, Decal, Paint Job and RAT ROD

ONE OF A KIND\r\n=========================== \r\nHelp us design a car of your choice and get it into the game and have the ability to race it. Due to its rareness it will be super valuable. Includes everything in REBEL WITH A CAUSE reward tier + Kickstarter ONLY Hood Scoop, Rims, Decal, Paint Job and RAT ROD

HRH IMMORTAL\r\n=========================== \r\nGet yourself drawn as a CHARACTER in the game and dish out losses to the world forever! Also, we\u2019ll print your character on a 20\u201d x 24\u201d canvas and send it to you signed + get the video of your portrait becoming the character + the image file for safe keeping. Includes everything CAMS & HEADERS in the reward tier + Kickstarter ONLY Hood Scoop, Rims, Decal, Paint Job and RAT ROD

HRH MOGUL\r\n===========================\r\nDesign and name your OWN car brand complete with 4 models. Includes everything in REBEL WITH A CAUSE reward tier + Kickstarter ONLY Hood Scoop, Rims, Decal, Paint Job and RAT ROD

KING OF THE STREETS\r\n=========================== \r\nGet the naming rights to the game\u2019s diner + Become the face of the diner with a custom drawn portrait of your face. Includes everything in REBEL WITH A CAUSE reward tier + Kickstarter ONLY Hood Scoop, Rims, Decal, Paint Job and RAT ROD
